dict.acceptation: 广阔的，广大的；范围广泛的；[物]广延的；[逻]外延的；

sent.orig: Extensive to it contrary, it is extensive cultivation.
sent.trans: 粗放与之相反，就是广种薄收。

sent.orig: Ozone-layer depletion above the Arctic is not as extensive as expected because of unusually warm weather.
sent.trans: 因为不正常的暖气候，北极上空臭氧层消耗的范围并不像我们预期的那么大。

sent.orig: How extensive and costly network changes are depends on the technology choice.
sent.trans: 网络变化有多大、代价有多高与选择的技术有关。

sent.orig: This course features extensive study materials and video lectures.
sent.trans: 本课程以涵盖广泛之研习资料及影音课堂讲稿为特色。

sent.orig: Longstanding structural problems and the extensive pattern of growth remain serious problems.
sent.trans: 长期形成的结构性矛盾和增长方式粗放问题仍然突出。
